description: Primary 6 Mathematics Topics and Subtopics - Singapore MOE Curriculum

syllabus: using a letter to represent an unknown number
notation, representations and interpretation of simple algebraic expressions such as a + 3, 3a, a/3
simplifying simple linear expressions excluding brackets
evaluating simple linear expressions by substitution
solving simple linear equations involving whole number coefficient only in simple context

subtopics.display_name: 2.1 Dividing Whole Number By Proper Fractions
syllabus: dividing proper fractions by a whole number

subtopics.display_name: 2.2 Dividing Proper Fractions by Proper Fractions
syllabus: dividing a whole number/proper fraction by a proper fraction
solving word problems involving the 4 operations
relationship between distance, time and speed exclude conversion of units e.g. km/h to m/min
finding average speed in simple context
solving up to 3-step word problems involving speed and average speed
expressing ratios in simplest form
expressing ratios as fractions
finding equivalent fractions and ratios
solving word problems involving ratio including changing ratios

subtopics.display_name: 5.1 Radius and Diameter of a Circle
syllabus: finding radius and diameter of a circle
finding circumference of a circle using π = 3.14
finding area of a circle using π = 3.14
finding perimeter of semi-circles and quadrants
finding area of semi-circles and quadrants

subtopics.display_name: 5.6 Area and Perimeter of Composite Figures
syllabus: finding the area and perimeter of composite figures made up of square, rectangle, triangle, semicircle and quarter circle
finding one dimension of a cuboid given its volume and the other dimensions
finding the length of one edge of a cube given its volume
finding the height of a cuboid given its volume and base area
finding the area of a face of a cuboid given its volume and one dimension
use of square root and cube root signs
reading and interpreting pie charts
finding the fraction of a whole represented by a sector in a pie chart
solving 1-step problems using data from tables/graphs

subtopics.display_name: 7.1 Finding Whole Given Part and Percentage
syllabus: finding the whole given a part and its percentage
finding the part given a whole and its percentage
finding the percentage given a part and a whole
finding percentage increase and decrease in simple context
solving word problems involving percentages
finding unknown angles in simple geometric figures involving square, rectangle, triangle, parallelogram, rhombus, trapezium
